1.title: Soccer Aid Special
1.plot: Travel show presenter Charley Boorman, TV presenter Kirsty Gallacher, returning champion and Countdown (1982) and 8 Out of 10 Cats Does Countdown (2012) presenter Rachel Riley and TV sports presenter Clive Tyldesley prove to be toughy for the Dark Destroyer.

2.title: Coronation Street Special
2.plot: Coronation Street (1960) stars, Simon Gregson, Victoria Ekanoye, Lucy Fallon and Andrew Whyment compete against the unmovable veteran Chaser, Shaun Wallace, to win some money for their charity of choice. Things don't go well. Bradley Walsh hosts.

10.title: Christmas Special
10.plot: Bradley Walsh hosts this special Christmas edition of the Chase. Celebrities include: Patti Clare, Matt Richardson, Kirsty Wark and Jimmy Osmond. Mark "The Beast" Labbett, Anne "The Governess" Hegerty, Paul "Sinnerman" Sinha, Shaun "The Dark Destroyer" Wallace, and the newest chaser, Jenny "The Vixen" Ryan, all get to participate in this special event.

imdb.title: Celebrity Chase
plot: In this spinoff of _The Chase (2009)_ (qv), celebrities compete against the show's regular cast of Chasers in an attempt to win some money for their charity of choice.
